review:
We are extremely happy with Dr Rashmi, in fact, the only reason how our pregnancy went so well is solely attributed to the good doctors care. She was able to quickly identify issues with cervical length and contractions even before external symptoms were visible. 

During the fifth month of our pregnancy, it was only due to the doctor's intuition that we performed a cervical scan and identified that the cervical length was extremely low and a stitch was needed.

Again at around 32 weeks, it was again the doctor's intuition that found us doing another scan where we found that her canal was starting to open and bed rest was needed.

In both cases, my wife had experienced no physical discomfort nor any external symptoms that rang any alarms. 

The doctor was able to identify all these issues with her experience beforehand and was able to perform remedial actions. Thanks to her my wife gave birth at 37 weeks without any issues.

If ever we decide to have another child, we would prefer no other doctor but Dr Rashmi Choudhary and I recommend her to all my friends.
